Artiphon Opens Pre-order for INSTRUMENT 1

01 Oct 2015

Artiphon opened up a pre-order sale of the INSTRUMENT 1 for $399.

You can get $25 off using the code:

TouchSound25

More details:

  • Available in black or white (choose the Gig Edition to add a custom soft case and strap)
  • Receive $25 for each additional pre-order you refer to a friend
  • Ships in early 2016 (US addresses only)
  • Limited quantity of pre-order units available

The pre-order is available at artiphon-preorder.com.
